learning_goals.name: LG 1
learning_goals.description: explain major concepts: difference between enterprises, businesses and organisation, primary and secondary processes of a business, organisational structures and Information systems and relations of an organisation and its environment.

learning_goals.name: LG 2
learning_goals.description: apply concepts of LG1 in a business game and company visit and analyse, advice, design and implement a strategy in the business game.

learning_goals.name: LG 1
learning_goals.description: construct, based on a given business case, and interpret simple business process models using UML activity diagrams.

learning_goals.name: LG 1
learning_goals.description: analyse, design and advice on a complete IT service organisation (Organisation, Processes) based on a given case.

learning_goals.name: LG 1
learning_goals.description: PRJ21 - explain the difference between as-is and to-be business processes and demonstrate how use cases support the to-be process by making use of activity diagrams

learning_goals.name: LG 2
learning_goals.description: to research a given topic (emerging technology/technique) and to prepare a solution (proposal) for this topic within a given context (paper).

learning_goals.name: LG 1
learning_goals.description: choose and apply techniques for retrieving requirements.
